title: Finance
description: A modern finance landing page with animated stats, responsive layout, and smooth scroll effects. Built using React and Tailwind CSS.

title: E-commerce
description: An e-commerce frontend layout showcasing product listings, filtering, and a clean shopping UI. Built using React and Bootstrap.

title: Dog Selling Website
description: A pet adoption and selling website made using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, featuring service listings and a responsive layout.

title: Portfolio
description: My personal developer portfolio built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS. Features project showcases and smooth scroll navigation.

title: Guess the Number (Game)
description: A fun JavaScript-based number guessing game with simple UI and interactive gameplay logic. Great for beginner-level logic practice.

title: Tech Solution
description: A mock IT solution agency website built using the MERN stack. Designed to showcase services and contact options with a professional UI.
